name: QuickLook Plugin
summary: A QLPLUGIN file is a plug-in for QuickLook, which is the unofficial Windows version of macOS's Quick Look tool. It is installed by previewing the QLPLUGIN file in QuickLook and clicking the Click here to install this plugin. button that appears. QLPLUGIN files are similar to macOS's .QLGENERATOR files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
